price: Nítorí náà, ègbé ni fún àwọn tó ṣàì gbàgbọ́ ní ọjọ́ wọn tí À ń ṣe ní àdéhùn fún wọn.
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
